styles.teamTitle: font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; color: white; background: black; padding: 8px; text-align: center; border-radius: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px;
styles.linkItem: display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; text-decoration: none; color: inherit; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #000; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease; background-color: red; color: white;
styles.linkText: flex: 2; text-align: center; color: white; font-weight: bold;
